text_block_list.text:
Shortly after I was hired at Tracen Academy, Chairman Akikawa 
had asked me show a transfer student around the academy.

I appreciate your cooperation. 
She's the Uma Musume I invited from America――
text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf

text_block_list.text: ――I'm Symboli Kris S.
text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S

text_block_list.text:
Kris S, you can go take a look right away. 
Your presence will breathe new life in to this school.
text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf

text_block_list.text:
Yes. Invitation, received―― I'm grateful. 
And my mission―― I will complete it without fail.
text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S

text_block_list.text:
Hm…… that's right. Engrave your presence and strength 
in to the Turf of this country. Well, then――
text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf

text_block_list.text: ――Guidance. ――I'll leave it to you.
text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S

text_block_list.text:
Symboli Kris S seemed like the quiet type but…… being overseas in 
an unfamiliar school could be unsettling too. That's why――
choice_data_list: I'll try to make the tour fun!

text_block_list.text:
For starters, the training gym, a point of pride 
of Tracen Academy! Undoubtedly, the number of specialized 
machines would be a sight to behold!
――Looks fulfilling.
text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S

text_block_list.text:
Next, was the cafeteria, universally loved by everyone! 
Just by eating something sweet, it'll fill you with happiness!
――No. Snacking――is to be avoided.
text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S

text_block_list.text:
For large scale events, occasionally, 
the outdoor stage is used……!
…… ……――wide open.
text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S

text_block_list.text:
And what you've been waiting for, Tracen Academy's pride, the 
training course! If it's an Uma Musume that loves racing, they'll 
definitely love it……!
Turf……――the grass, is really green.
text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S

text_block_list.text:
No matter where I took her, Symboli Kris S remained 
expressionless. I was starting to feel uneasy, and that's when――

Hey, that Uma Musume…… isn't she the one from the rumors? 
The one invited from America.
text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A

text_block_list.text:
Uwah, you're right! To think the "Emperor" was the one to 
invite her…… that must mean, she's got amazing abilities, huh?
text_block_list.name: Mid-Rank Trainer A

text_block_list.text:
Hey, you! If you'd like, do you want to try running? It's open 
now, so it's a good chance to take a look at the course.
text_block_list.name: Mid-rank Trainer A

text_block_list.text:
Everyone's curious, you know. What was it that the 7 crown Uma 
Musume Rudolf-san saw that made her decide to invite you……?
text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A

text_block_list.text:
All the senpai trainers spotted Symboli Kris S, 
and before I realized it, we were surrounded……!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
choice_data_list: You can run if you want, I'll wait

text_block_list.text:
……――No. 
Guidance―― In progress.
text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S

text_block_list.text: ――――Please continue.
text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S

text_block_list.text:
I could only nod in response to that―― 
I then ask if she's really okay with that.

――Up until now―― You've politely guided me. 
……―― I'll listen―― until the end.
text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S

text_block_list.text:
And so we retreated from the gaze of my senpais. 
For some reason, we ended up back at the trainers' offices――
choice_data_list: Was it fine to continue the tour?
Was it fine to continue the tour?

text_block_list.text:
In a place with so many veterans, if she had shown her strength, 
the chances of being scouted would increase significantly.

Really? When I was about to respond with that―― 
I noticed that Symboli Kris S' gaze had wavered for a moment.
――It was…… helpful.
text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S

text_block_list.text:
The words that were eventually spoken were still apathetic. But 
that long pause meant she was 『Searching for the right words』.

……――very much so. 
――That's why, please continue.
text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S

text_block_list.text:
Very. ――It was very helpful. Considering how much time she had 
spent considering that modifier, I believed it was not flattery.

Was it awkwardness, or discipline, or―― was she just too kind? 
While feeling a sense of warmth, I continued the tour.

While I was taking a break after the tour was over―― 
Symboli Rudolf stopped by to ask about today.

――I see. Even though it was quite sudden, you still did your best 
to carry it out. I can't thank you enough.
text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf

text_block_list.text:
Trainer <username>, I know it's an unreasonable request but…… 
If you don't mind, after this would you continue to look after her?
text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf

text_block_list.text:
――Certainly, she seemed to be a kind but awkward Uma Musume. 
There would probably be times where she would be misunderstood.
For better or worse, she will gather attention. That's why――
text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
choice_data_list: If you're fine with it, leave it to me

text_block_list.text: ……I appreciate it.
text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf

text_block_list.text:
Symboli Kris S. She had the abilities to be invited from 
overseas, and an aura that made it clear she was not ordinary―― 
but, probably, she was still a kind Uma Musume.
choice_data_list: <size=35>(As a newbie, it has nothing to do with me……)</size>
<size=35>(As a newbie, it has nothing to do with me……)</size>

text_block_list.text:
She was attracting attention from well known veteran trainers, 
so the chances of me becoming her trainer were quite low.
That made me feel a little down.
